name: Spirits of Mystery: Family Lies (Full) - Hidden
name_original: Spirits of Mystery: Family Lies (Full) - Hidden
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Your mother, the Queen, has been harboring a deep, dark secret ever since the day you were born. Now, your kingdom is under attack from a strange foe with the power to control plants, and your mother is set to be executed at midnight. You must delve deep down into the roots of your family tree to unlock this mystery and rescue her before it’s too late!

• FIND THE SECRET BEFORE IT DESTROYS YOUR FAMILY!
Is the evil sorcerer Isa up to his old tricks again, or is this something entirely different? What could be so terrible that your mother kept this secret from the whole family?

• CAN YOU SAVE THE QUEEN FROM CERTAIN DEATH?
Race against the clock to same your mother through marvelous hidden object scenes.

• USE THE POWER OF YOUR MOTHER’S MAGICAL AMULET
Remove the thorns in your path to solve tangled puzzles and mysterious mini-games.

• UNTANGLE A DANGEROUS WEB IN THE ENCHANTING BONUS CHAPTER
Protect your royal family and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Pearls, special achievements, and more!
